tooltip.ars_elemental.caster_tome: 用於模仿學派核心的能力。
effect.ars_elemental.enderference.descri: 使目標無法進行傳送或被傳送。
effect.ars_elemental.watery_grave.descri: 使目標沉入水中，並使氧氣耗盡速度更快。
effect.ars_elemental.mana_shield.descrip: 使用魔力來減輕受到的傷害，並有機率迴避掉負面效果。
effect.ars_elemental.static_charged.desc: 效果持續時間結束時，召喚一道閃電擊中受靜電影響的目標。
effect.ars_elemental.hellfire.descriptio: The hellfire burns even nether creatures, reducing the healing power and making it vulnerable to fire.
effect.ars_elemental.life_link.descripti: Caster will split incoming damage with the target and the target will split incoming healing with the caster. Using Cut will dispel the effect on both sides.
effect.ars_elemental.enthralled.descript: 受迷惑的生物將不會攻擊施法者，而是會反過來保護他們。
effect.ars_elemental.hymn_of_order.descr: 無法取得的藥水，僅供伺服器管理員使用。受該效果懲罰的玩家，其法力值將被設為 1，並禁止施放法術，大大減少他們在伺服器中作亂的機會。
盾牌有機率能夠將投射物法術反射回去。
enchantment.ars_elemental.soulbound.desc: 防止物品在死亡時掉落。
ars_elemental.page.elemental_tweaks: 只要安裝《元素魔藝》模組，就會啟用以下調整：$(br)巫師之盾會在格擋傷害時，觸發「反應」附魔。$(br)使用魔符召喚出的閃電，將不再摧毀物品。$(br)粉碎魔符在使用敏感增強後，能直接對掉落物進行處理。$(br)寒流魔符現在也能對凍結的生物，造成更多傷害。$(br)點燃魔符能將冰塊融化成水。
ars_elemental.page1.flashing_archwood: This golden tree has an affinity with the sky. Just like the other archwood trees it can be found anywhere and in their biome. It can be used to make ritual tablets or as a dim light source. The corresponding Weald Walker launches enemies in the air and wind shear them.
ars_elemental.page2.flashing_archwood: A fruit with a shocking flavour used to brew Static Charge Potions, causing a lightning to fall on the entity when the duration ends or allowing Discharge to hit. The energy stored in the fruit may cause whoever eats it to glow, get night vision, be shocked or charged with static energy.
ars_elemental.page1.spell_horn: The 巫師 Horn can be used to cast spells on you and nearby entities. Hold the Horn to increase the range, at max charge it will also give a Spell Damage effect to the player. It MUST be inscribed with a spell that does NOT have another method, using a Scribing Table.
ars_elemental.page.curio_bag: All those trinkets can easily clutter your inventory, but you never know when they will be useful. Using some magebloom fiber you can make a pouch to store and carry around curios, potion flasks, charms and other small items. You can also open it with $(k:ars_elemental.open_pouch) while in the hotbar or in a curio slot.
ars_elemental.page.caster_bag: The trinket pouch can only hold rather small things, but with a stronger fiber it seems possible to hold different kind of magical items. The Spellcaster bag can hold any caster tool and the mod's magic armor, arrow and shield. You can also open it with $(k:ars_elemental.open_pouch) while in the hotbar or in a curio slot.
ars_elemental.page1.fire_focus: This spell focus is attuned to the school of Fire. While equipped, the glyphs of this school will be amplified and discounted. The lesser focus, as a drawback, will weaken glyphs of the other elemental schools. The major focus will also grant Spell Damage II while the wearer is on fire or in lava.
ars_elemental.page2.fire_focus: This focus empowers Ignite to inflict Hellfire Burn. This effect reduces healing and allows flare to inflict damage and spread even on fire resistant mobs. Summon Steed will be changed to summon a rideable Strider. Ignite + Evaporate combo will sublimate Ice.
ars_elemental.page1.water_focus: This spell focus is attuned to the school of Water. While equipped, the glyphs of this school will be amplified and discounted. The lesser focus, as a drawback, will weaken glyphs of the other elemental schools. The major focus will also grant Mana Regen I while the wearer is wet or Mana Regen II and Dolphin Grace while swimming.
ars_elemental.page2.water_focus: This focus empowers Freeze, adding Freezing seconds to the target. If used after Conjure Water, the conjured water will become ice. Summon Steed will be changed to summon a rideable Dolphin, time your jumps out of the water to build up speed. All Drowning damage against water creatures will be converted to magic.
ars_elemental.page1.air_focus: This spell focus is attuned to the school of Air. While equipped, the glyphs of this school will be amplified and discounted. The lesser focus, as a drawback, will weaken glyphs of the other elemental schools. The major focus will also grant Mana Regen I while the wearer stands over Y 200 or is under the shocked effect.
ars_elemental.page2.air_focus: This focus empowers Launch, changing it to apply Levitate when augmented with ExtendTime. It also empower Cut, giving chances to drop an head or skull if it deals the killing blow.
ars_elemental.page1.earth_focus: This spell focus is attuned to the school of Earth. While equipped, the glyphs of this school will be amplified and discounted. The lesser focus, as a drawback, will weaken glyphs of the other elemental schools. The major focus also grants Mana Regen I while the wearer stand under Y 0.
ars_elemental.page2.earth_focus: This focus empowers Poison Spores and Grow, dealing damage to undead with a chance of spawning a spore blossom, and Gravity, when augmented with Sensitive, changing it to create a gravity field that pull entities towards its center (filter-compatible), also offers knockback resistance and boosts natural and instant healing by 1.5.
ars_elemental.page1.necrotic_focus: This school of magic branched out from Conjuration and Abjuration mages that tried to understand life, death and what's between. The essence tied to this school cycles between life and death, experiments suggest that it will make horses cycle between flesh, skeleton and zombie forms, but will it be the same horse as before?
ars_elemental.page2.necrotic_focus: By imbuing the Focus of Summoning with evil energies, you can corrupt its powers towards Necromancy. Glyphs of the Anima school will get two free ExtendTime, Heal gets two amplify and Charm has way more chance to affect undead mobs. Summon Steed will change in Summon Skeletal Steed, which is able to walk and breathe underwater.
ars_elemental.page3.necrotic_focus: Summoned Wolves, Undead and Vexes seems unchanged at first, but if they die while the summoner wear this focus they will rise from death once, filled with blood lust. These undead summons will cast Homing spells when you do and heal you every time they kill an enemy.
ars_elemental.page.water_upstream: This block generates an upstream current that will make surrounding entities in water float upwards as if inside a bubble column, even if they are not in source blocks. Sneaking will allow to descend.
ars_elemental.page.magma_upstream: This block generates an upstream current that will make surrounding entities in lava float upwards and gain a short Fire Resistance effect. Sneaking will allow to descend
ars_elemental.page.air_upstream: This block generates an upstream current that will make surrounding entities levitate. Sneaking will give Slowfall and allow to descend. Consumes Source when at least an entity is affected.
ars_elemental.page.everfull_urn: This magic urn converts Source into water. Link a cauldron or an Apothecary to the urn using a dominion wand and it will be refilled for a cheap amount of source.
ars_elemental.page1.fire_golem: The Flarecannon can be used as a wandering sentry, like the weald walkers. It will shoot flare homing projectiles at enemies and patrol around the area assigned using the dominion wand. Soul Sand and Magma blocks can be used to change appearance. If defeated, it can be reactivated with blaze powder or magma cream. Friends call it Firenando.
ars_elemental.page1.mermaid: Sirens are found in warmer seas, jumping out of the water or following boats. You can befriend a wild mermaid by giving them a sea pickle, they will jump and leave behind few shards. The siren charm can be used to summon a Siren and if used on Prismarine it will transform in a Siren Shrine. Tamed sirens can change colors if you give them kelp or corals.
ars_elemental.page2.mermaid: The Shrine will slowly generate fishing loot items over time, asking for source after each cycle. The number of items and chance of getting a treasure will increase if many different water animals and plants are near the Shrine. You should build an aquarium or pond around the Shrine, to let your sirens have fun. [Note: it will take some time to update the score].
ars_elemental.page1.advanced_prism: Upgrade of the Spell Prism that can be adjusted to aim to a specific block. Use the dominion wand to link the prism to a block. This prism also allows lenses, but can't be pushed by pistons.
ars_elemental.page2.advanced_prism: A Prism Lens can be applied to this advanced prisms to customize how the prism redirects projectiles. Arc and Homing lenses change the projectile to be an arc or homing projectile. Rainbow lens randomize the color of the projectile, while Acceleration and Deceleration lenses allow to adjust the speed.
ars_elemental.page.spell_mirror: Mirror similar to a Spell Prism that can be placed on walls, floor and ceiling. If a spell projectile hits the mirror, it will be reflected by with a mirrored angle.
ars_elemental.page1.elemental_turrets: Enchanted Turrets can be imbued with the power of an elemental focus to gift them a fractions of its abilities. Spells shot by these turrets will trigger the combos of the corresponding focus and will be discounted by 65 %% if the spell contains a glyph of the matching elemental school.
ars_elemental.page.base_bangle: This magic accessory has a chance to boost the damage of your spells. Its magic is unstable but perhaps attuning it to a school can stabilize its abilities.
ars_elemental.page1.air_bangle: This bangle will boost the damage of your Air spells. Your arms sparks with the element, giving a passive boost to speed and attack knockback.
ars_elemental.page1.fire_bangle: This bangle will boost the damage of your Fire spells. Your arms are engulfed in the element, setting on fire enemies hit and granting a passive boost to speed while in hot biomes.
ars_elemental.page1.earth_bangle: This bangle will boost the damage of your Earth spells. Plants blossom on your arms, inflicting snare to enemies hit and granting the wearer immunity to cactus and berry bushes and knockback resistance.
ars_elemental.page1.water_bangle: This bangle will boost the damage of your Water spells. Your arms chills the air around, freezing enemies on every hit. It will also grant the wearer a passive boost to speed in water and rain.
ars_elemental.page.book_protection: This book upgrade will protect your spellbook from all kinds of damage, may it be a cactus or a pool of lava. Can't guarantee on the void. The gold inlays will become netherite-black but you can toggle it off in the client configs.
ars_elemental.perk_desc.thread_shock: 法術中的傷害效果會在效果結算前額外造成短暫的觸電。造成等級 3 的靜電。
ars_elemental.perk_desc.thread_spore: 法術中的傷害效果會在效果結算前額外造成短暫的劇毒或飢餓。
ars_elemental.perk_desc.thread_summon: 每級減少 10%% 召喚失調的持續時間。從 2 級開始，還能略為提高召喚物造成的傷害。
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_squirre: 位於區域內的星寶石獸，將獲得長時間的速度提升效果。在半徑為 15 格方塊的範圍內，每 30 秒刷新一次增益效果。使用黃金方塊可以將範圍擴大到 30 格方塊。
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_tesla_c: 對靠近儀式效果範圍內的實體進行雷擊。若使用風之精華強化，玩家也將列為雷擊目標。[以儀式火盆為中心的 11x7x11 立方體]
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_repulsi: 擊退半徑 15 格方塊範圍內的所有生物。若使用骨頭強化，將只會擊退不死生物。無法對玩家與 Boss 生物產生效果。
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_attract: 使儀式火盆像磁鐵一樣，吸引半徑 8 格方塊範圍內的所有實體。無法對玩家與 Boss 生物產生效果。
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_detecti: 使半徑 128 格方塊範圍內的所有怪物，獲得 10 分鐘的發光效果。
ars_elemental.enchantment_desc.mirror_sh: 只能附魔在巫師之盾上。使用盾牌進行格擋時，有機率反彈法術投射物。每級額外提高 25% 反彈機率。
ars_elemental.enchantment_desc.soulbound: 防止具有該附魔的物品，在死亡時掉落。
ars_elemental.familiar_desc.siren_famili: 賽蓮使魔能增加 2 點水元素學派法術的傷害。位於水中時，還會給予召喚者「海豚悠游 II」效果。在一隻賽蓮旁進行綁定儀式可獲得該使魔。
ars_elemental.familiar_desc.firenando_fa: 炎之哨兵使魔能增加 2 點火元素學派傷害，還會減輕 20%% 投射物法術的耗魔量。餵食其岩漿球時，能獲得抗火增益效果。在一隻炎之哨兵旁進行綁定儀式可獲得該使魔。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_discharge: 對帶有靜電或觸電的實體使用，能釋放其身上積蓄的電能，除了會對實體本身造成傷害，還會使其周圍的敵人觸電。若傷害是由靜電觸發，該效果將會獲得強化。若主目標身上穿有以能量驅動的盔甲，將吸收其部分的能量並用於提高傷害。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_bubble_sh: 製造一層保護膜，透過消耗魔力來減輕受到的傷害。這層護盾還能防止實體受到負面效果。若在防禦時耗盡魔力，保護膜將會消除。若同時裝備水之核心，還能夠治癒獄火燃燒的傷害。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_watery_gr: 讓一隻生物注定被溺死。減少目標獲得的氧氣，並在氧氣耗盡時造成溺水傷害。與重力相似，當目標處於水中時將急速下沉，可使用延長時效增強。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_conjure_t: 放置泥土或其他地形方塊。放置的方塊數量，可用範圍效果與穿透增加。使用一次強化構件將改放置鵝卵石；使用二次則改放置深板岩碎石，或使用以下其中一種組合：搭配召喚水構件將放置泥巴；若在搭配強化構件之後使用熔煉增強，將會放置石頭或深板岩；若搭配粉碎構件將放置沙，若再搭配強化構件則會放置砂岩。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_poison_sp: 在目標身上爆發出孢子毒霧，對其造成傷害並使劇毒與飢餓效果，擴散到附近實體。只能對會受到劇毒傷害或飢餓影響的生物造成傷害。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_phantom_g: 治療不死生物少量生命值。當對存活的生物使用時，法術會對其造成等量的魔法與消耗度傷害，
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_homing_pr: 該投射物會尋找並跟隨最近的實體，若附近沒有有效的目標時，其行為模式就如同經典的投射物。只有在使用感應增強時，才會將玩家視作目標。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_propagato: 將法術的剩餘部分轉換為導引投射物，並從其著陸的位置射出。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_curved_pr: 該投射物會受重力影響。每使用一次反彈增強，都能使投射物在接觸地面時再彈跳一次。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_propagato: 將法術的剩餘部分轉換為弧線形投射物，並從其著陸的位置射出。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_aquatic_f: 除非法術的目標是水生生物，否則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_aquat: 如果法術的目標是水生生物，則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_aerial_fi: 除非法術的目標是飛行生物，否則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_aeria: 如果法術的目標是飛行生物，則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_fiery_fil: 除非法術的目標是對火焰免疫或帶有火焰屬性的生物，否則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_fiery: 如果法術的目標是對火焰免疫或帶有火焰屬性的生物，則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_insect_fi: 除非法術的目標是節肢動物，否則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_insec: 如果法術的目標是節肢動物，則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_undead_fi: 除非法術的目標是不死生物，否則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_undea: 如果法術的目標是不死生物，則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_summon_fi: 除非法術的目標是召喚物，否則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_summo: 如果法術的目標是召喚物，則停止法術的解析過程。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_life_link: 在你與目標的生命原力之間建立聯繫。你所受到的任何傷害，都會與你聯繫的目標分享；目標獲得的任何治療效果，都將會與你分享。剪切魔符能夠切斷這段聯繫關係，結束雙方的聯繫效果。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_charm: 試圖支配敵人的心智，使其成為你暫時的盟友為你而戰；使可馴服的生物被馴服；或是使野生的動物墜入愛河。每次強化與造成的傷害，都會提升目標被成功魅惑的機率，因為強大的生物會對你的控制，具有較高的抗性。
death.attack.hellflare.item: %1$s was burned by %2$s with the magic flames of %3$s
ars_elemental.armor_set.shift_info: 按住 %s 查看套裝資訊
ars_elemental.lens.shift_info: 按住 %s 查看透鏡資訊
ars_elemental.lens.arc: Convert the redirected projectile in an Arc Projectile.
ars_elemental.lens.homing: Convert the redirected projectile in an Homing Projectile. The targeting filters of the original projectile won't be inherited.
ars_elemental.lens.rgb: Randomly change the color of the redirected projectile.
ars_elemental.lens.acceleration: Increase the speed of the redirected projectile.
ars_elemental.lens.deceleration: Decrease the speed of the redirected projectile.
ars_elemental.lens.pierce: Makes the redirected projectile more piercing if source is supplied.
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.wip: Note: Since the Armor Rework requires a lot of assets work, the light and heavy elemental armors variants won't be ready for 1.19, so the 'medium' elemental armors can be crafted will all three types. Upgrading will keep enchants and threads, but requires the base armor to be at tier 3.
ars_elemental.armor_set.fire.desc: 吸收部分火元素相關傷害並轉換為魔力，能立即撲滅火焰。
ars_elemental.armor_set.aqua.desc: 吸收部分水元素相關傷害並轉換為魔力，溺水時將自動補充氧氣。
ars_elemental.armor_set.earth.desc: 吸收部分地元素相關傷害並轉換為魔力，在即將餓死時，在地底深處提供食物。
ars_elemental.armor_set.air.desc: 吸收部分風元素相關傷害並轉換為魔力，摔傷將不再是個問題！
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.fire: Attuned to the School of Fire, each piece of this armor will amplify fire glyphs, make them cheaper, and reduce damage related to fire, like lava, dragon breath and magma.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and fire is immediately put out.
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.aqua: Attuned to the School of Water, each piece of this armor will amplify water glyphs, make them cheaper and reduce damage related to water, like drowning, freezing and lightning.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and refill air if about to drown.
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.air: Attuned to the School of Air, each piece of this armor will amplify air glyphs, make them cheaper and reduce damage related to air, like falling, hitting walls while flying and lightning.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and falling won't be a problem anymore!.
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.earth: Attuned to the School of Earth, each piece of this armor will amplify earth glyphs, make them cheaper and reduce damage related to earth, like starving, berry bushes, cactus and crushing.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and gives food deep underground if about to starve.
tooltip.siren_shards: 透過給與賽蓮海鞘獲得。
tooltip.ars_elemental.lens: 可被安裝在進階法術稜鏡上。
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.ende: 飛濺 終界干涉藥水
飛濺 終界干涉藥水
飛濺 終界干涉藥水
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.e: 滯留 終界干涉藥水
滯留 終界干涉藥水
滯留 終界干涉藥水
ars_elemental.adv.title.firenando_charm: They call me Firenando Mc Cannon
ars_elemental.adv.desc.lesser_air_focus: Acquire a lesser focus of Air
ars_elemental.adv.desc.air_focus: Acquire a major focus of Air
ars_elemental.adv.desc.lesser_fire_focus: Acquire a lesser focus of Fire
ars_elemental.adv.desc.fire_focus: Acquire a major focus of Fire
ars_elemental.adv.desc.lesser_earth_focu: Acquire a lesser focus of Earth
ars_elemental.adv.desc.earth_focus: Acquire a major focus of Earth
ars_elemental.adv.desc.lesser_water_focu: Acquire a lesser focus of Water
ars_elemental.adv.desc.water_focus: Acquire a major focus of Water
ars_elemental.adv.title.curio_bag: Never ask a mage what's in their bag
ars_elemental.adv.desc.spore_blossom: Obtain a Spore Blossom by killing an undead with Grow or Poison Spores
ars_elemental.adv.desc.mark_of_mastery: Combine the essences with the tribute and obtain the Mark of Mastery
ars_elemental.adv.desc.summon_dolphin: Summon a dolphin using Summon Steed wearing a water focus
ars_elemental.adv.desc.summon_strider: Summon a strider using Summon Steed wearing a fire focus
ars_elemental.adv.desc.summon_skeleton_h: Summon a skeleton horse using Summon Steed wearing a necromancy focus
ars_elemental.adv.desc.everfull_urn: Acquire an Urn of Endless Waters
ars_elemental.adv.desc.levitation: Use Launch + Extend Time while wearing an air focus to make a mob levitate
ars_elemental.adv.desc.mirror_shield: Reflect a spell projectile using a spell reflection shield
